verses.verse: <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass, <S%G1161><s%> While <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> Was <S%G1511><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Having Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Upper <S%G510><s%> Parts, <S%G3313><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%>

He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G1487><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Did Ye Receive, <S%G2983><s%> Having Believed? <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G235><s%> Even <S%G3761><s%> If The <S%G1487><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Did We Hear. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G5037><s%> To <S%G4314><s%>, Them, <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Were Ye Baptized? <S%G907><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> Baptism. <S%G908><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Baptized With <S%G907><s%> A Baptism. <S%G908><s%> Of Repentance, <S%G3341><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> ' After <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Should Believe, <S%G4100><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> They Were Baptized <S%G907><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Laid <S%G2007><s%> On Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2980><s%> And They Were Speaking <S%G5037><s%> With Tongues <S%G1100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prophesying. <S%G4395><s%>
<S%G2258><s%> And Were <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> About <S%G5616><s%> Twelve. <S%G1177><s%>

<S%G1525><s%> And Having Entered <S%G1161><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> He Spoke Boldly, <S%G3955><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Reasoning <S%G1256><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Persuading <S%G3982><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Were Hardened <S%G4645><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Disobeyed, <S%G544><s%> Speaking Evil Of <S%G2551><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude, <S%G4128><s%> Having Departed <S%G868><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Separated <S%G873><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> ' Disciples, <S%G2596><s%> Daily <S%G2250><s%> Reasoning <S%G1256><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> School <S%G4981><s%> Of Tyrannus <S%G5181><s%> A Certain. <S%G5100><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> And This <S%G1161><s%> Was <S%G1096><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Inhabited <S%G2730><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G2453><s%> Both Jews <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Greeks. <S%G1672><s%>

<S%G1411><s%> And Works Of Power <S%G5037><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Common <S%G5177><s%> Wrought <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of Paul, <S%G3972><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Being Sick <S%G770><s%> Were Brought <S%G2018><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Skin <S%G5559><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Handkerchiefs <S%G4676><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Aprons, <S%G4612><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Departed <S%G525><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disease, <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G5037><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2021><s%> But Took In Hand <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wandering <S%G4022><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Exorcists, <S%G1845><s%> To Name <S%G3687><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> We Adjure <S%G3726><s%> You By <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Proclaims. <S%G2784><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And There Were <S%G1161><s%> Certain Men <S%G5100><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Sceva <S%G4630><s%> A Jew, <S%G2453><s%> A High Priest <S%G749><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Were Doing. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answering <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I Know, <S%G1097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> I Am Acquainted With; <S%G1987><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> But, <S%G1161><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Are Ye? <S%G2075><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Leaping <S%G2177><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Mastered <S%G2634><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Prevailed <S%G2480><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%>, Them, <S%G846><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Naked <S%G1131><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wounded <S%G5135><s%> They Escaped <S%G1628><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G3624><s%> House. <S%G1565><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> And This <S%G1161><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Known <S%G1110><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2453><s%> Both Jews <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Inhabiting <S%G2730><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fell <S%G1968><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Magnified <S%G3170><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> And Many <S%G5037><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Confessing <S%G1843><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Declaring <S%G312><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Deeds. <S%G4234><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2425><s%> And Many <S%G1161><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Curious Arts <S%G4021><s%> Practised <S%G4238><s%> Having Brought <S%G4851><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Books <S%G976><s%> Burnt Them <S%G2618><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Reckoned Up <S%G4860><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prices <S%G5092><s%> Of Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Found It <S%G2147><s%> Of Silver <S%G694><s%> Myriads <S%G3461><s%> Five. <S%G4002><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> With <S%G2596><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Increased <S%G837><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prevailed. <S%G2480><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> Were Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Purposed <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Having Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Achaia, <S%G882><s%> To Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%>, Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> My <S%G3165><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%> To See. <S%G1492><s%>

<S%G649><s%> And Having Sent <S%G1161><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Ministered <S%G1247><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Erastus, <S%G2037><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Remained <S%G1907><s%> A Time <S%G5550><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia. <S%G773><s%>

Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> At <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G2540><s%> Time <S%G1565><s%> Disturbance <S%G5017><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Small <S%G3641><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way. <S%G3598><s%>

Demetrius <S%G1216><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> A Certain Man <S%G5100><s%> By Name, <S%G3686><s%> A Silversmith, <S%G695><s%> Making <S%G4160><s%> Temples <S%G3485><s%> Silver <S%G693><s%> Of Artemis, <S%G735><s%> Brought <S%G3930><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Artificers <S%G5079><s%> Gain <S%G2039><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Little; <S%G3641><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Having Brought Together, <S%G4867><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such Things <S%G5108><s%> Workmen, <S%G2040><s%> He Said; <S%G2036><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> Ye Know <S%G1987><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gain <S%G2039><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wealth <S%G2142><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye See <S%G2334><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Of Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Almost <S%G4975><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Having Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> Turned Away <S%G3179><s%> A Great <S%G2425><s%> Multitude, <S%G3793><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G1526><s%> Gods <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Are Made. <S%G1096><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Is Dangerous <S%G2793><s%> To Us Lest <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Business <S%G3313><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Disrepute <S%G557><s%> Come, <S%G2064><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Goddess <S%G2299><s%> Artemis <S%G735><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Be Reckoned, <S%G3049><s%> <S%G3195><s%> And Be About <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Be Destroyed <S%G2507><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Majesty <S%G3168><s%> Of Her, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World <S%G3625><s%> Worships. <S%G4576><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard, <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Become <S%G1096><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of Indignation, <S%G2372><s%> They Cried Out <S%G2896><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Artemis <S%G735><s%> Of The Ephesians. <S%G2180><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Filled <S%G4130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> With Confusion, <S%G4799><s%> <S%G3729><s%> And They Rushed <S%G5037><s%> With One Accord <S%G3661><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Theatre, <S%G2302><s%> Having Seized With Them <S%G4884><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> Macedonians, <S%G3110><s%> Fellow Travellers <S%G4898><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Intending <S%G1014><s%> To Go In <S%G1525><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G1218><s%> Did Not <S%G3756><s%> Suffer <S%G1439><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

<S%G5100><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Chiefs Of Asia <S%G775><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Friends, <S%G5384><s%> Having Sent <S%G3992><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Urged Him <S%G3870><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Venture <S%G1325><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Theatre. <S%G2302><s%>

Some Therefore <S%G243><s%> One Thing <S%G3303><s%> And <S%G3767><s%> Some <S%G243><s%> Another <S%G5100><s%> Were Crying Out; <S%G2896><s%> For <S%G2258><s%> Was <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Confused, <S%G4797><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most <S%G4119><s%> Did <S%G3756><s%> Not Know <S%G1492><s%> For What <S%G5101><s%> Cause <S%G1752><s%> They Had Come Together. <S%G4905><s%>

But <S%G1537><s%> From Among <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> They Put Forward <S%G4264><s%> Alexander, <S%G223><s%> Thrusting Forward <S%G4261><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Alexander, <S%G223><s%> Having Made A Sign With <S%G2678><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand, <S%G5495><s%> Wished <S%G2309><s%> To Make A Defence <S%G626><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G1218><s%>
